Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back View gallery / Back 14_CORTEO Acrobatic CDS_1920 Auckland Cirque Du Soleil Corteo - Auckland 1 Night • Cirque Du Soleil Corteo ticket Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Corteo, which means cortege in Italian, is a joyous procession, a festive parade imagined by a clown. The show brings together the passion of the actor with the grace and power of the acrobat to plunge the audience into a theatrical world of fun, comedy and spontaneity situated in a mysterious space between heaven and earth. View more View less 1 nights + Cirque Du Soleil Corteo ticket from $ 409 per person share twin. Flights are additional Enquire now Sale Period : until 31 Aug 25 or until sold out Your inclusions 1 Nights accommodation at Four Points by Sheraton Auckland in a Guest Room A Reserve admission to Cirque du Soleil Corteo at Spark Arena Session dates and times Thursday 30 October at 7.30pm Friday 31 October at 7.30pm Saturday 01 November at 4.00pm Saturday 01 November at 8.00pm Sunday 02 November at 12.00 noon Sunday 02 November at 4.00pm Room Types Four Points by Sheraton Guest room from $409 per person share twin From $409 per person (twin share) From $569 per person (single) From $359 per person (triple share) From $329 per person (quad share) Travel 30 Oct - 02 Nov 25 Terms & Conditions Sales until 31 Aug 25 or until sold out• Prices are correct as at 24 March 25 • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation. Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability • Full payment is required at the time of booking • Tickets are subject to availability at the time of booking • Package price includes an infrastructure charge of 1.5% (per transaction), a Handling Fee of $8.40 (per transaction) & a compulsory Arena Land Levy of $4.95 per ticket •Prices are per person in NZ dollars for cash or cheque purchase only • Travel commenced and completed as specified • Min/max stays apply • Accommodation is limited and is subject to availability at time of booking • Triple & Quad pricing is for 2x Children 12 & under can share a twin room using existing bedding • Packages are based on consecutive night stays at specified hotel – should your needs differ please ask your House of Travel consultant • Group prices are not applicable on these packages • Amendment and cancellation fees apply – please ask your House of Travel consultant.
